channel.title: Free item recoloring
channel.description:
Hello, I enjoy recoloring more than I should. Thus I have discovered the perfect recipe for creating 100% pure recolors with zero unnecessary lines.
I will make recolors with proper ints for any items that exist in the [b][u]474 cache.[/u][/b] This means up to model 29126 or so.
NOTE: I made changes to the original ItemDef naming. I use these: [code] [LEFT: Original] [RIGHT: My renaming]
itemDef.originalModelColors ------> itemDef.omc itemDef.modifiedModelColors ------> itemDef.mmc
itemDef.modelRotation1 -----------> itemDef.modelRotationX itemDef.modelRotation2 -----------> itemDef.modelRotationY itemDef.modelOffset1 -------------> itemDef.modelOffsetX itemDef.modelOffset2 -------------> itemDef.modelOffsetY
itemDef.anInt185 -----------------> itemDef.maleEquip185 //maleEquip3 itemDef.anInt162 -----------------> itemDef.femaleEquip162 //femaleEquip3
itemDef.anInt175 -----------------> itemDef.maleChathead175 //maleChathead1 itemDef.anInt197 -----------------> itemDef.femaleChathead197 //femaleChathead1 [/code] If you want to use these you can rename them by replacing all in Client.java and ItemDef.java with notepad++.
Feel free to post or send a private message for the item you want recolored. I will post the completed recolors on this thread. Happy coloring!

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @Grey_Cabbage Grey Cabbage
item.description:
@Grey_Cabbage wrote:

Hey can you get a better picture of the armour like put in the equipment screen?
Client I used was a basic 317 client with 474 models so it doesn't have equipment screen. I will change clients soon or just zoom in client when taking screenshots

Read full topic

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @godz_of_gear godz of gear
item.description:
@godz_of_gear wrote:

[quote=“Grey Cabbage, post:30, topic:531533”]Here’s a spooky Nechryael costume that absolutely everybody voted for. Enjoy

Skull is a full helm
Torso is a platebody

Variable name conversions are probably necessary, refer to first post

case 17000: itemDef.name = "Nechryael skull"; itemDef.description = "An evil death skull.".getBytes(); itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Bind"; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 209; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 10841; itemDef.maleEquip2 = 1131; itemDef.femaleEquip2 = 1131; itemDef.maleEquip3 = 5183; itemDef.femaleEquip3 = 5183; itemDef.modelID = 2388; itemDef.groundActions = null; itemDef.modelOffsetX = -1; itemDef.modelOffsetY = -10; itemDef.modelRotationX = 160; itemDef.modelRotationY = 64; itemDef.modelZoom = 530; itemDef.anInt204 = 1996; itemDef.maleChathead1 = 149; itemDef.femaleChathead1 = 10832; itemDef.omc = new int[9]; itemDef.mmc = new int[9]; itemDef.omc[0] = 0; itemDef.mmc[0] = 4; itemDef.omc[1] = 5231; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7240; itemDef.omc[2] = 8282; itemDef.mmc[2] = 7240; itemDef.omc[3] = 6241; itemDef.mmc[3] = 7240; itemDef.omc[4] = 7240; itemDef.mmc[4] = 5231;//Skull itemDef.omc[5] = 4; itemDef.mmc[5] = 0;//Eyes itemDef.omc[6] = 3008; itemDef.mmc[6] = 2981;//Pentagram itemDef.omc[7] = 4550; itemDef.mmc[7] = 3274;//Neck itemDef.omc[8] = 926; itemDef.mmc[8] = 982;//Neck blood break; case 17001: itemDef.name = "Nechryael torso"; itemDef.description = "Made from 100% real Nechryael skin.".getBytes(); itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 315; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 478;//Chest itemDef.maleEquip2 = 4952; itemDef.femaleEquip2 = 5029;//Arms itemDef.maleEquip3 = 282; itemDef.femaleEquip3 = 446;//Amulet itemDef.modelID = 5164; itemDef.groundActions = null; itemDef.modelOffsetX = 0; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 5; itemDef.modelRotationX = 412; itemDef.modelRotationY = 1920; itemDef.modelZoom = 1310; itemDef.omc = new int[12]; itemDef.mmc = new int[12]; itemDef.omc[0] = 10299; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5231;//Bone itemDef.omc[1] = 4401; itemDef.mmc[1] = 3274;//Main itemDef.omc[2] = 4397; itemDef.mmc[2] = 3275;//Main dark itemDef.omc[3] = 4521; itemDef.mmc[3] = 2248;//Main darker itemDef.omc[4] = 2349; itemDef.mmc[4] = 982;//Main darkest itemDef.omc[5] = 4550; itemDef.mmc[5] = 3274;//Male chest main itemDef.omc[6] = 7056; itemDef.mmc[6] = 3404;//Female chest main itemDef.omc[7] = 926; itemDef.mmc[7] = 929; itemDef.omc[8] = 929; itemDef.mmc[8] = 3274;//Inner triangle itemDef.omc[9] = 11200; itemDef.mmc[9] = 2981;//Outer triangle itemDef.omc[10] = 40384; itemDef.mmc[10] = 3274;//Arms darker itemDef.omc[11] = 40918; itemDef.mmc[11] = 198;//Arms lighter break; case 17002: itemDef.name = "Nechryael bottoms"; itemDef.description = "Made from 100% real Nechryael skin.".getBytes(); itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 8735; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 8731; itemDef.modelID = 8738; itemDef.groundActions = null; itemDef.modelOffsetX = 0; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 6; itemDef.modelRotationX = 536; itemDef.modelRotationY = 0; itemDef.modelZoom = 1710; itemDef.omc = new int[2]; itemDef.mmc = new int[2]; itemDef.omc[0] = 3171; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5231;//Main itemDef.omc[1] = 10266; itemDef.mmc[1] = 3274;//Bone break; [/quote] Hey can you get a better picture of the armour like put in the equipment screen?

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @Grey_Cabbage Grey Cabbage
item.description:
@Grey_Cabbage wrote:

Here’s a spooky Nechryael costume that absolutely everybody voted for. Enjoy

Skull is a full helm
Torso is a platebody

Variable name conversions are probably necessary, refer to first post

case 17000:
	itemDef.name = "Nechryael skull";
		itemDef.description = "An evil death skull.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Bind";
			itemDef.maleEquip1 = 209; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 10841;
			itemDef.maleEquip2 = 1131; itemDef.femaleEquip2 = 1131;
			itemDef.maleEquip3 = 5183; itemDef.femaleEquip3 = 5183;
			itemDef.modelID = 2388; itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.modelOffsetX = -1; itemDef.modelOffsetY = -10;
			itemDef.modelRotationX = 160; itemDef.modelRotationY = 64;
			itemDef.modelZoom = 530; itemDef.anInt204 = 1996;
			itemDef.maleChathead1 = 149; itemDef.femaleChathead1 = 10832;
			itemDef.omc = new int[9]; itemDef.mmc = new int[9];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 0; itemDef.mmc[0] = 4;
			itemDef.omc[1] = 5231; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7240;
			itemDef.omc[2] = 8282; itemDef.mmc[2] = 7240;
			itemDef.omc[3] = 6241; itemDef.mmc[3] = 7240;
				itemDef.omc[4] = 7240;	itemDef.mmc[4] = 5231;//Skull
				itemDef.omc[5] = 4; 	itemDef.mmc[5] = 0;//Eyes
				itemDef.omc[6] = 3008; 	itemDef.mmc[6] = 2981;//Pentagram
				itemDef.omc[7] = 4550; itemDef.mmc[7] = 3274;//Neck
				itemDef.omc[8] = 926; itemDef.mmc[8] = 982;//Neck blood
	break;
case 17001:
	itemDef.name = "Nechryael torso";
		itemDef.description = "Made from 100% real Nechryael skin.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
			itemDef.maleEquip1 = 315; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 478;//Chest
			itemDef.maleEquip2 = 4952; itemDef.femaleEquip2 = 5029;//Arms
			itemDef.maleEquip3 = 282; itemDef.femaleEquip3 = 446;//Amulet
			itemDef.modelID = 5164; itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.modelOffsetX = 0; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 5;
			itemDef.modelRotationX = 412; itemDef.modelRotationY = 1920;
			itemDef.modelZoom = 1310;
			itemDef.omc = new int[12]; itemDef.mmc = new int[12]; 
				itemDef.omc[0] = 10299; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5231;//Bone
				itemDef.omc[1] = 4401; itemDef.mmc[1] = 3274;//Main
				itemDef.omc[2] = 4397; itemDef.mmc[2] = 3275;//Main dark
				itemDef.omc[3] = 4521; itemDef.mmc[3] = 2248;//Main darker
				itemDef.omc[4] = 2349; itemDef.mmc[4] = 982;//Main darkest
				itemDef.omc[5] = 4550; itemDef.mmc[5] = 3274;//Male chest main
				itemDef.omc[6] = 7056; itemDef.mmc[6] = 3404;//Female chest main
				itemDef.omc[7] = 926; itemDef.mmc[7] = 929;
				itemDef.omc[8] = 929; itemDef.mmc[8] = 3274;//Inner triangle
				itemDef.omc[9] = 11200; itemDef.mmc[9] = 2981;//Outer triangle
				itemDef.omc[10] = 40384; itemDef.mmc[10] = 3274;//Arms darker
				itemDef.omc[11] = 40918; itemDef.mmc[11] = 198;//Arms lighter
	break;
case 17002:
	itemDef.name = "Nechryael bottoms";
	itemDef.description = "Made from 100% real Nechryael skin.".getBytes();
	itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 8735; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 8731;
		itemDef.modelID = 8738; itemDef.groundActions = null;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = 0; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 6;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 536; itemDef.modelRotationY = 0;
		itemDef.modelZoom = 1710;
		itemDef.omc = new int[2]; itemDef.mmc = new int[2]; 
			itemDef.omc[0] = 3171; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5231;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 10266; itemDef.mmc[1] = 3274;//Bone
	break;

Read full topic

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @Grey_Cabbage Grey Cabbage
item.description:
@Grey_Cabbage wrote:

[quote=“Doing Cho2, post:26, topic:531533”][quote author=Grey Cabbage link=topic=650322.msg4372248#msg4372248 date=1381023011]

Grey Cabbage, can you show me how to get the original colors. I really want to know how you do that? Please show me?

You need: DatMaker and Metasequoia
You also need the .dat files for the models (file names should be 0.dat, 1.dat, 3525.dat, etc)
You should still be able to find all these things on the internet

[In DatMaker]
-Load the folder containing the .dat models by clicking File -> Open Folder
-Next, Scroll down to the model ID of the item you are finding the colors of, then go to File -> Export -> MQO

[In Metasequoia]
-Open the .mqo that DatMaker created, it should be in the same folder as the .dat files.
-On the right side of the model, the original colors will appear as “mat####”. The number that follows is the original color
[/quote]
In metasequoia, is there a way to click on the item, and in the material panel, it goes to that color? Because what I do now, since i cnat find a way to do that^, i click on 1 color, change it, see if it is the right place, then re-color it. So, is there a way to click on an area, and it goes to its material color?[/quote]
There probably is, but I just use the same method you do. Changing the material color to something like bright green works fine for me, and shouldn’t take too long unless the model uses thousands of different colors.

Read full topic

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @Grey_Cabbage Grey Cabbage
item.description:
@Grey_Cabbage wrote:

All those models are from the 474 cache
The model IDs are under maleEquip1/2/185, femaleEquip1/2/162 and modelID

Torva platebody is a recolored granite body (459) with added skull symbols (317)

Torva platelegs are recolored bandos tassets (474)

Torva full helm is torag’s helm

Read full topic

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

[quote=“Grey Cabbage, post:18, topic:531533”][quote author=Doing Cho2 link=topic=650322.msg4370400#msg4370400 date=1380484146]
Can you do recolored torva set, divine (one color), and bronze (g).
If you do one example for each one, i know how to add other colors.
I just cant find the correct ints for the colors.
Thanks
[/quote]
Bronze (g):

i love that Torva :D
case 15011:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze full helm (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze full helmet with gold trim.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.maleChathead175 = 56; itemDef.femaleChathead197 = 116;
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 394; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 218;
		itemDef.modelID = 2813; itemDef.modelZoom = 800;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = -1; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 6;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 160; itemDef.modelRotationY = 152;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[2]; itemDef.mmc = new int[2];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 61; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Helm
			itemDef.omc[1] = 926; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7114;//Plume
	break;
case 15012:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze platebody (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze plate body with gold trim.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 344; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 164;
		itemDef.femaleEquip2 = 3383; itemDef.maleEquip2 = 3379;
		itemDef.modelID = 2378; itemDef.modelZoom = 1180;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = -1; itemDef.modelOffsetY = -1;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 452; itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[3]; itemDef.mmc = new int[3];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 61; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 41; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7050;//Darker
			itemDef.omc[2] = 24; itemDef.mmc[2] = 7114;//Trim
	break;
case 15013:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze platelegs (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze platelegs with gold trim.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 432; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 268;
		itemDef.modelID = 2582; itemDef.modelZoom = 1740;
		itemDef.modelOffsetY = -8;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 444; itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[3]; itemDef.mmc = new int[3];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 61; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 41; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7050;//Darker
			itemDef.omc[2] = 57; itemDef.mmc[2] = 7114;//Trim
	break;
case 15014:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze plateskirt (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze plateskirt with gold trim.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 4207; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 4206;
		itemDef.modelID = 4208; itemDef.modelZoom = 1100;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = 5; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 5;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 620; itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[4]; itemDef.mmc = new int[4];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 61; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 41; itemDef.mmc[1] = 25238;
			itemDef.omc[2] = 57; itemDef.mmc[2] = 7114;//Trim
			itemDef.omc[3] = 25238; itemDef.mmc[3] = 7050;//Darker
	break;
case 15015:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze kiteshield (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze kiteshield with gold trim.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 486; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 486;
		itemDef.modelID = 2339; itemDef.modelZoom = 1560;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = -6; itemDef.modelOffsetY = -14;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 344; itemDef.modelRotationY = 1104;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[3]; itemDef.mmc = new int[3];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 61; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 57; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7114;//Trim
			itemDef.omc[2] = 7054; itemDef.mmc[2] = 7114;//Trim
	break;
case 15016:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze gloves (g)";
	itemDef.description = "A pair of gloves.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 13319; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 13307;
		itemDef.modelID = 13631; itemDef.modelZoom = 789;
		itemDef.modelOffsetY = -1;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 609; itemDef.modelRotationY = 111;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[2]; itemDef.mmc = new int[2];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 10394; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 8656; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7114;//Trim
	break;
case 15017:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze boots (g)";
	itemDef.description = "These will protect my feet.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 5031; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 4954;
		itemDef.modelID = 5037; itemDef.modelZoom = 770;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = 3; itemDef.modelOffsetY = -3;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 154; itemDef.modelRotationY = 156;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[3]; itemDef.mmc = new int[3];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 61; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 5648; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7114;
			itemDef.omc[2] = 5400; itemDef.mmc[2] = 7050;
	break;

Divine spirit shield and torva:

case 15018:
	itemDef.name = "Divine spirit shield";
	itemDef.description = "An ethereal shield with a divine sigil attached to it.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 5196; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 5196;
		itemDef.modelID = 5198; itemDef.modelZoom = 1720;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = -1; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 33;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 232; itemDef.modelRotationY = 928;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[4]; itemDef.mmc = new int[4];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 43127; itemDef.mmc[0] = 15925;//Brightest
			itemDef.omc[1] = 36975; itemDef.mmc[1] = 15922;//Medium
			itemDef.omc[2] = 38119; itemDef.mmc[2] = 15919;//Darkest
			itemDef.omc[3] = 61; itemDef.mmc[3] = 105;//Handle
	break;
case 15019:
	itemDef.name = "Torva full helm";
	itemDef.description = "An ancient warrior's full helm.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.maleChathead175 = 6572; itemDef.femaleChathead197 = 6576;
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 6689; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 6656;
		itemDef.modelID = 6592; itemDef.modelZoom = 660;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = 11; itemDef.modelRotationY = 212;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[3]; itemDef.mmc = new int[3];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 10394; itemDef.mmc[0] = 21;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 10514; itemDef.mmc[1] = 21;//Main
			itemDef.omc[2] = 8656; itemDef.mmc[2] = 79;//Horns
	break;
case 15020:
	itemDef.name = "Torva platebody";//requires 474 models
	itemDef.description = "An ancient warrior's platebody.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 20737; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 20735;
		itemDef.femaleEquip2 = 20738; itemDef.maleEquip2 = 20736;
		itemDef.femaleEquip162 = 328; itemDef.maleEquip185 = 328;
		itemDef.modelID = 20739; itemDef.modelZoom = 1280;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 336; itemDef.modelRotationY = 2016;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[7]; itemDef.mmc = new int[7];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 10277; itemDef.mmc[0] = 20;//Main
			itemDef.omc[1] = 10275; itemDef.mmc[1] = 21;//Trim
			itemDef.omc[2] = 10279; itemDef.mmc[2] = 24;//Main
			itemDef.omc[3] = 10283; itemDef.mmc[3] = 26;//Darker
			itemDef.omc[4] = 10270; itemDef.mmc[4] = 424;//Underbelly
			itemDef.omc[5] = 4550; itemDef.mmc[5] = 424;//Skin
			itemDef.omc[6] = 0; itemDef.mmc[6] = 79;//Symbols
	break;
case 15021:
	itemDef.name = "Torva platelegs";//requires 474 models
	itemDef.description = "An ancient warrior's platelegs.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 27755; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 27739;
		itemDef.modelID = 28131; itemDef.modelZoom = 854;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 540; itemDef.modelRotationY = 2039;
		itemDef.modelOffsetX = 3; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 3;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;
			itemDef.omc = new int[7]; itemDef.mmc = new int[7];
			itemDef.omc[0] = 39; itemDef.mmc[0] = 22;
			itemDef.omc[1] = 22; itemDef.mmc[1] = 21;//Greaves
			itemDef.omc[2] = 163; itemDef.mmc[2] = 154;
			itemDef.omc[3] = 154; itemDef.mmc[3] = 424;//Belt
			itemDef.omc[4] = 4550; itemDef.mmc[4] = 12;//Skin
			itemDef.omc[5] = 9523; itemDef.mmc[5] = 79;//Drape dark
			itemDef.omc[6] = 8390; itemDef.mmc[6] = 25;//Drape
	break;

Here’s what they look like, my client only loads 474 models so I was unable to acquire the actual torva models.
[/quote]
Can i have the models for that Torva?

If you do one example for each one, i know how to add other colors.
I just cant find the correct ints for the colors.
Thanks[/quote]
Bronze (g):

case 15011:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze full helm (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze full helmet with gold trim.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.maleChathead175 = 56; itemDef.femaleChathead197 = 116;

		itemDef.modelOffsetX = -1; itemDef.modelOffsetY = 6;
		itemDef.modelRotationX = 160; itemDef.modelRotationY = 152;
		itemDef.groundActions = null;

			itemDef.omc[0] = 61; itemDef.mmc[0] = 5652;//Helm
			itemDef.omc[1] = 926; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7114;//Plume
	break;
case 15012:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze platebody (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze plate body with gold trim.".getBytes();
		itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";

			itemDef.omc[1] = 41; itemDef.mmc[1] = 7050;//Darker

	break;
case 15013:
	itemDef.name = "Bronze platelegs (g)";
	itemDef.description = "Bronze platelegs with gold trim.".getBytes();

	break;
case 15014:

case 15015:

case 15016:

case 15017:

	break;

Divine spirit shield and torva:

case 15018:

case 15019:

case 15020:
	itemDef.name = "Torva platebody";//requires 474 models

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

[quote=“Grey Cabbage, post:11, topic:531533”]Your client might be different than regular renamed

for the first error, get rid of .getBytes()

for the others, do Ctrl-F: public void setDefaults()
your originalModelColors and modifiedModelColors variable naming should be 4 or 5 lines under the void (1st below description = null)[/quote]

src\ItemDef.java:114: error: cannot find symbol
originalModelColors = null;
^
symbol: variable originalModelColors
location: class ItemDef
src\ItemDef.java:115: error: cannot find symbol
modifiedModelColors = null;
^
symbol: variable modifiedModelColors
location: class ItemDef

Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.

item.title: Free item recoloring
item.dc:creator: @Grey_Cabbage Grey Cabbage
item.description:
@Grey_Cabbage wrote:

Your client might be different than regular renamed

for the first error, get rid of .getBytes()

for the others, do Ctrl-F: public void setDefaults()
your originalModelColors and modifiedModelColors variable naming should be 4 or 5 lines under the void (1st below description = null)

Read full topic
